sentences.en: Better marry over the madden than over the moor.
Better woo over the midden than over the moor.
sentences.cn: 愿嫁邻家男,不嫁外乡汉.

sentences.en: Colliford is higher, right up on the moors.
sentences.cn: 考里弗德更高，正好在荒野之上。

sentences.en: For example, Professor Moor notes the continued difficulty to train computers to use and translate language.
sentences.cn: 例如, Moor教授注意到训练电脑使用和翻译语言的那种持续性的困难.

sentences.en: Heavy dew fell and drenched the moor like rain, and this refreshed me for a while.
sentences.cn: 雨点般浓浓的露水湿透了荒原, 我的精神也振作了一会儿.

sentences.en: I decided to moor near some tourist boats.
sentences.cn: 我决定在一些观光船附近停泊。

sentences.en: It was getting dark again, and I was alone on the moor.
sentences.cn: 天又黑了, 我只身一人在沼泽地上.

sentences.en: It was not long before he got to the enchanted moor.
sentences.cn: 不久,他就到了那片被施法的荒野.

sentences.en: Keep to the path parts of the moor are bog.
sentences.cn: 沿着这条小路走--荒野上多处是沼泽地.

sentences.en: Our path skirted along the moor.
sentences.cn: 我们的小径沿松鸡猎场蜿蜒而上.

sentences.en: She advised him to send her to the lonely moor.
sentences.cn: 她建议把她送到偏远的荒野去.

sentences.en: The open countryside was pleasant, the green moor sparkling in the sunshine.
sentences.cn: 广阔的村野,令人心旷神怡; 绿色的沼泽,在阳光下闪闪发光.

sentences.en: The search party spread out over the moor.
sentences.cn: 搜索队在荒草地分散行动.

sentences.en: They went grouse shooting up on the moors.
Two or three fishing boats were moored alongside the pier.
sentences.cn: 有两三艘渔船停泊在码头边。

sentences.en: We moved slowly across the moor, looking at every centimetre of mud.
sentences.cn: 我们慢慢的穿过沼泽, 观察着每一公分的泥泞.

sentences.en: Wet or fair, calm or storm , she took her daily ride over Stilbro's Moor.
sentences.cn: 无论晴雨, 有风无风, 她天天要骑马上斯蒂布罗泽地去.

trans.tran_cn: 荒野，旷野，沼泽，摩尔人，停泊，抛锚
trans.tran_en: a wild open area of high land, covered with rough grass or low bushes and  heather  , that is not farmed because the soil is not good enough
to fasten a ship or boat to the land or to the bottom of the sea using ropes or an anchor

trans.tran_cn: 使停泊，系住，（把飞船）拴在系留塔上，固定
